title: 91/597/ECSC: Commission Decision of 6 September 1991 on the conclusion of a Protocol on trade and commercial and economic cooperation between the European Coal and Steel Community (ECSC), on the one hand, and the Republic of Poland, on the other
header:
COMMISSION DECISION of 6 September 1991 on the conclusion of a Protocol on trade and commercial and economic cooperation between the European Coal and Steel Community (ECSC), on the one hand, and the Republic of Poland, on the other (91/597/ECSC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
The Protocol on trade and commercial and economic cooperation between the ECSC, on the one hand, and the Republic of Poland, on the other, is hereby approved on behalf of the ECSC.
The text of the Protocol is attached to this Decision.
The Commission shall designate the member of the Commission empowered to sign the Protocol in order to bind the ECSC.
This Decision shall be published in the Official Journal of the European Communities.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 6 September 1991.
For the Commission
Frans ANDRIESSEN
Vice-President
